forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain developing after midnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 64F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
